text:
We hope we will hear from you shortly and that authorisation for the
broadcast rights in the manner which we have outlined will be forthcoming.
If you would like to have additional information about the use to which
these poems will be put, may I Suggest that you contact Dr. Robert
Goodell, Chief, Radio EngUsh-0*eaehing Branch, Voice of America,
Washington, D.C., Rhone WO 3-6373*
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
